name: North of England City Experience (Liverpool-Hull-N'castle)
description: NORTH OF ENGLAND CITY EXPERIENCE Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions on "TransPennine Express" services for any 4 days in an 8 day period. The area extends from Liverpool in the west to Hull in the east and Newcastle in the north via Manchester and Leeds. It includes Manchester Airport but is only valid on TPE services.
time_restrictions: Mon to Fri: valid from 09:30. No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays.
route_restrictions: Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions on "TransPennine Express" services for any 4 days in an 8 day period. The area extends from Liverpool in the west to Hull in the east and Newcastle in the north via Manchester and Leeds. It includes Manchester Airport but is only valid on TPE services. Not valid via Bradford. Not valid via Sheffield. Not valid via Todmorden.
where_to_buy: Ticket Vending Machine (TVM): Some Northern, Avanti West Coast, and LNER TVMs sell these tickets (see notes)
Valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
